identity.name: Obsidian Command Center
identity.description: A high-density, high-performance environment for social media professionals. It balances the 'Jewel' tones of social media content with the 'Obsidian' utility of a command terminal.
principles: Content is King: The media (images/videos) pops against the dark background.
Zoom In: High density data, but clear focus states.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, widget headers, and metrics. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all interface text, messages, and inputs.

mono.usage: Use for timestamps, IDs, and analytics data points.

spacing.strategy: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) for containers, tight gaps (gap-2, gap-4) for data grids.

buttons.style: Sharp corners or slight radius (rounded-md). High contrast hover states.

cards.style: Flat dark surface with 1px border. No heavy drop shadows.

glass_panels.style: Use for sticky headers and floating action bars.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to prevent banding.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Glows instead of shadows. Use colored drop-shadows for primary actions.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly (0.98) on click. Links have a sliding underline.

media.icons: Lucide React (Default). Use @phosphor-icons/react for more 'weight' if needed.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is WCAG AA compliant. Use lighter grays (Zinc-400) for secondary text, never dark gray on black.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Obsidian' color palette defined above. Ensure 'dark' class is applied by default or via system preference.
2. FONT SETUP: Import Manrope and Inter from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. LAYOUT: Build the Dashboard using the 'Bento Grid' strategy. Avoid equal-width columns. Use col-span-2 for main content, col-span-1 for sidebars.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Jewel & Luxury' aesthetic. Remove default heavy shadows, replace with borders and glows.
5. GLASSMORPHISM: Apply the 'glass_panels' classes to the Unified Inbox header and the Sidebar navigation.
6. AI FEATURES: When displaying AI suggestions, use a distinct visual container (e.g., a border with a gradient or a subtle 'sparkle' icon) to differentiate from human text.
7. SOCIAL INTEGRATION: Use the specific brand colors (FB/Insta/LinkedIn) ONLY for their respective icons or tags. Do not color the entire card.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts or default Shadcn styling without customization.
Dark Mode First: Design for dark mode primarily. Light mode should be high-contrast 'Paper' style.
Micro-Animations: Every hover needs a reaction. Use Framer Motion for smooth layout changes.
No Emoji Icons: Use Lucide icons instead of emojis for UI elements.
Toast Notifications: Use 'sonner' for all notifications.
